plot: A painter decorator is haunted by an invisible force which threatens him. Spilling paint on that force reveals a monster he was not expecting.
title: Liquid Spirit
plot_es: A painter decorator is haunted by an invisible force which threatens him. Spilling paint on that force reveals a monster he was not expecting.
plot_en: A painter decorator is haunted by an invisible force which threatens him. Spilling paint on that force reveals a monster he was not expecting.
